review: So easy to use, and so small that it isn't even noticeable plugged into the back of the TV!
author: Dan Evans

review: Great after purchasing Amazon prime. Useless otherwise.
author: Tess Martinez

review: I prefer this to my Apple TV.  Amazon's interface is better than Apple's.  This stick is plenty powerful enough for HD watching.  Only real downside is that I can't use airplay, but I knew that going in.
author: jgeod

review: The Fire stick exceeded my expectations. Very easy set up with a host of options to watch TV, movies, Netflix...etc. The remote is the biggest takeaway for me. You do have the option to download the app and use your phone. More options that Google Chromecast and at the right price point.
author: A. Little

review: I love this product. It works very well. I'm able to watch most of the things I want to watch and there are a few little games that my kids can play on it. I just canceled cable and this is a really good way to get in some TV without the high cost of cable!
author: N. Rumeau

review: easy to use and great device for traveling!
author: PKAK

review: So far I like the idea of the Fire TV Stick. I was under the impression that some of the apps were included, such as Netflix, HBO Go etc... But it's great once you make the purchase of the applications.
author: M. Elliott

review: I love my fire stick. It is so easy to use and reasonably priced. I ordered another one and plan on ordering more for presents for family.
author: sandy h

review: Quick and easy setup. Plan to get another one for other tvs.
author: Kristy Robertson
